description: An overarching dashboard that provides a high-level view of the entire infrastructure's health and performance by aggregating key metrics from all actors (Gateway, RelayMiner, Full Node). This dashboard is essential for quickly assessing the network's status and identifying any potential issues.

title: High level overview
